entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
